infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow Daily Meetup Selfie to access your camera to take selfies with friends.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow Daily Meetup Selfie to access your microphone for video calls.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Daily Meetup Selfie to access your camera to take selfies with friends.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Daily Meetup Selfie to access your photos to select profile images.

plugins.cameraPermissionText: Allow Daily Meetup Selfie to access your camera to take dual-camera selfies.
plugins.microphonePermissionText: Allow Daily Meetup Selfie to access your microphone for video calls.
